name: Planet Hollywood Chicken Crunch
ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (or tenders)
instructions: I do it in the deep fryer at 350 for 4 min. 30 sec.
I use tenders, but if you use breast halves, cut them into strips.
Dredge chicken in milk, then coat with the cereal mix.
Do this to all your tenders.
